property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures {INVASION}-Light creature that costs 5 or more (When one of your light creatures that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your water creatures gets the Magic Command race. ■ When this creature would be destroyed during your opponent's turn, your opponent draws 5 cards instead, and this creature gets +5000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WORLD BREAKER} ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you have less than 13 cards in your graveyard, this creature doesn't untap. ■ Whenever this creature untaps, shuffle your graveyard into your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a fire Dragon, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Mana Arms 5—When this creature is destroyed, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may put a fire Dragon that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 3 or more Snow Faerie creatures, you may summon this creature for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may return any number of Snow Faeries from your graveyard or mana zone to your hand. ■ Whenever your Snow Faeries would battle one of your opponent's creatures, you may have this creature battle instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all nature creatures from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ During your turn, if a player has 2 shields or less, you may summon a creature from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "shield trigger". {MANA ARMS} 3: When you put this creature, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Mana Arms 5―Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ Mana Arms 3―If you have 3 or more nature cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +5000 power and "triple breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Ultra Saver: Creature that costs 9 (When one of your creatures that costs 9 would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it on the top of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have an Angel Command Dragon in the battle zone you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {INVASION}-Water creature that costs 3 or more (When one of your water creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put a creature from your hand under this creature. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent may put any number of non-evolution creatures from their hand into the battle zone. Then you may summon a creature from your hand that costs more than your opponent's creature your opponent put into the battle zone that has the highest cost. (If your opponent put no creatures into the battle zone, you may summon any creature for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. If you have 2 or more creatures that have ??? or The Answer in their race in the battle zone, return all your opponent's creatures to their owners' hands instead.

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put one of your seals into your graveyard. ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts a seal on that creature. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rules

Rules
property.value: ■ Super Infinite Graveyard evolution—Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of your darkness creatures from your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, each of your opponent's creatures gets -5000 power until the end of the turn. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a darkness creature, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures and you may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

Put all non-evolution Fire Birds from among them into the battle zone, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, each of your other fire creatures get +6000 power and breaks an additional shield.

They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness or fire creatures. ■ S-Rank Invasion "Lightning Sonic"—Darkness or Fire Command (When one of your darkness or fire commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hand, battle zone or graveyard onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts a seal on that creature.
